title: Resolve the `could not find port error` when the pinheader component is present inside the Group
description: Fixes the could not find port error when the pinheader component is processed inside a group due to incorrect name substitution.
body: Previous substitution changed component names containing the text “pin”, such as "pinheader", to "portheader". When the selector for the pin header inside a group was processed.

title: add `with { type: "json" }` to schematic-corpus import
description: Adds a type declaration to the import statement for the schematic corpus, specifying that the imported data is in JSON format.

title: Now only count repos in a week wenesday to wendesday + show star rating on readme
description: This PR changes the weekly overview generation to count repositories from Wednesday to Wednesday and adds a star rating display in the README for each pull request.
body: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fb50ab9f-84e1-4d98-8dcd-35e3ea552958)

title: notifications update to include stars instead iof impact
description: Updates the notification system to display contribution star ratings instead of impact for pull requests.

title: Pass `traceClearance` as a configuration for the distance b/w trace and pad being used by freerouting
description: Adds a configuration option for traceClearance to customize the distance between traces and pads in the freerouting process.

title: Discard unsaved changes functionality to avoid reloading
description: Adds a confirmation dialog for users to discard unsaved changes, preventing accidental loss of data when navigating away from the editor.
body: https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a78ccd4-cd90-4ecb-9047-370396f0fbc5

title: support AI review text copying
description: Adds functionality to copy AI review text to clipboard when the AI review tab is active.

title: hide hidden files in search results of ctrl+find
description: Hides hidden files from the search results when using the ctrlfind functionality.

title: Themed loading state for runframe
description: Adds a themed loading state to the RunFrame component, replacing the default loading text with a styled loading animation.

title: Usable ViewTsFilesDialog to debug package files
description: Introduces a file tree structure to display TypeScript files and folders, adds search functionality to filter files based on user input, integrates CodeMirror for viewing and editing file content with syntax highlighting, implements file statistics display, and enhances UI with responsive sidebar and improved layout for better user experience.
body:
- Introduced a file tree structure to display TypeScript files and folders.
- Added search functionality to filter files based on user input.
- Integrated CodeMirror for viewing and editing file content with syntax highlighting.
- Implemented file statistics display, including total files and size.
- Enhanced UI with responsive sidebar and improved layout for better user experience.
# Before

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6e60983c-1154-4445-b899-bbac359b53a5)


# After


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ed923b97-6c0e-45b3-9600-0bbe41913586)

description: Introduces a new assignment solver for matching floating boxes to fixed boxes in a graph, along with a debugging interface for visualizing the assignment process.

title: adjust the exploration order to prioritize smaller nets when partitioning
